reflection.speaker: Narrator
reflection.text: Marcus's story has reached its conclusion. A wanderer has found his home.

summary.speaker: Narrator
summary.text: Through food and compassion, you've helped heal old wounds. Your reputation as more than just a cafe keeper grows.

dragon_growth.speaker: Narrator
dragon_growth.text: Your dragon companion has grown stronger too, learning new abilities and bonding closer with you.

new_arrival_hint.speaker: Narrator
new_arrival_hint.text: Word of your cafe has spread further. A perfectionist chef has heard tales of your cooking...

chapter_end.speaker: Narrator
chapter_end.text: New challenges and new stories await. Chapter 1 Complete.
